title: If RFK Jr. Turns the CDC Into An Anti-Vaxx Propaganda Outfit, I Don’t Want To Hear a Peep From Some “Respectable” Doctors
description: Any doctor who is unabashedly pro-vaccine has already spoken up about the normalization of anti-vaxx quackery within our ranks. The post If RFK Jr. Turns the CDC Into An Anti-Vaxx Propaganda Outfit, I Don’t Want To Hear a Peep From Some “Respectable” Doctors first appeared on Science-Based Medicine.

These doctors glossed over Mr. Kennedy’s anti-vaxx disinformation, claiming that he was a “free speech” champion, a fighter against chronic disease, and correct about his approach to the pandemic. An article titled Dr. Makary on RFK Jr’s Criticism of the ‘Medical Industrial Complex’: Saying Things ‘People Know Are True’ shows how desperate some WWTI doctors were to normalize his anti-vaxx disinformation. That article said:

DR. MARTY MAKARY: [Kennedy Jr.] talked about guilt by association, that sort of modern-day McCarthyism. He’s talked about how asking questions is not allowed. He asked a lot of questions himself. These “respectable” doctors said nothing, and their silence spoke volumes
